DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate overall satisfaction AIR OPTIX® COLORS compare FRESHLOOK® COLORBLENDS contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Two Color Contact Lenses Habitual Clear Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Willing able sign Informed Consent Document . If legal age consent , legally authorize representative must also sign Informed Consent Document . Able achieve best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/25 ( Snellen ) good eye distance . Manifest cylinder less equal 0.75 diopter eye . Wear contact lens within protocoldefined specification . Require spherical contact lens within available range power . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any eye condition contraindicate contact lens wear . Any systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution . Moderate severe ocular finding upon examination . Any use systemic ocular medication could contraindicate contact lens wear , include use topical ocular medication require instillation contact lens wear , except approve lubricating drop . Habitual lenses worn extend wear modality ( routinely sleep lens overnight 1 night per week ) last 3 month prior enrollment . Previous corneal refractive surgery irregular cornea . Eye injury surgery within last 6 month ( exclude placement punctal plug ) . Monovision monocular subject ( one eye functional vision ) subject fit one lens . History intolerance hypersensitivity component test article . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
